New_lead_assigned.title: New lead assigned
New_lead_assigned.body: You have been assigned a new Lead {case_no} {client_name}

Quotation_Sent.title: Quotation Sent
Quotation_Sent.body: A new Quotation {quotation_id} has been sent to the Lead {case_no} {client_name} assigned to you.

Quotation_Finalized.title: Quotation Finalized
Quotation_Finalized.body: Quotation {quotation_id} has been finalized by your lead {case_no} {client_name}

Quotation_Unfinalize.title: Quotation Unfinalize
Quotation_Unfinalize.body: Quotation {quotation_id} has been Unfinalize by your lead {case_no} {client_name}

Invoice_Raised.title: Invoice Raised
Invoice_Raised.body: Invoice of Amount Rs.{amount} has been raised to your Lead {case_no} {client_name}

Payment_Approved.title: Payment Approved
Payment_Approved.body: Payment has been approved of Rs.{amount} Against Invoice no {invoice_no} by {case_no} {client_name}

Payment_deposited.title: Payment Deposited
Payment_deposited.body: Payment has been deposited of Rs.{amount} Against Invoice no: {invoice_no} by {case_no} {client_name}

Appointment_Creation.title: Appointment Creation
Appointment_Creation.body: A new Appointment has been created for you on Dt ________ with Client __ By [Created By] _____ [Free / Paid]

Payment_Receivals.title: Payment Received
Payment_Receivals.body: A new payment has been Received of Rs.{amount} Against Invoice no: {invoice_no} by {case_no} {client_name}.Please Approve.

No_Attendance.title: No Attendance
No_Attendance.body: It looks like you forget to Mark the attendance.Please do it now.

Daily_Consolidated_Report.title: Daily Consolidated Report
Daily_Consolidated_Report.body: Invoices Raised:_________ Payment Received:____________ Invoices Cancelled:___________ Meetings Scheduled:_______

Appointment_reminder.title: Appointment reminder
Appointment_reminder.body: Todayâ€™s appointments scheduled for you are ______. To check details click here.

Expenses_Reminder.title: Expenses Reminder
Expenses_Reminder.body: It looks like you have not spent anything today. If yes please do the expenses entry to work account team on time approvals.
